sentences.sContent: The finance minister must weigh up the benefits of a tax cut versus those of increased public spending.
sentences.sCn: 财政部长必须权衡是减税还是增加公共开支更有利。

trans.tranCn: 〔比赛或诉讼中〕对，诉，对抗；与…相对
trans.tranOther: used to show that two people or teams are competing against each other in a game or court case
